data.title: Square One TV/Episode 405
data.text:
This article about an episode needs to be expanded with more information.

Please help out by editing it.

Episode 405 is the fifth episode of the fourth season of Square One TV, and the one-hundred sixtieth episode overall.

Starring:

Guest Starring: Maddie Corman (Babs Bengal), John Sayles (Roy "Lefty" Cobbs), John Griesemer (Frank N. Steenbrenner), Paul Dooley (Casey Bengal)

Co-Starring:

Contents

1 Segments

2 Credits

3 Notes

4 Trivia

4.1 The Show

4.2 Allusions and References

5 Quotes

Segments

Music Video: "Count the Ways" (The Judds) (cut from the Noggin version)

The Judds sing about how one of Wynonna's admirers expresses his affection in mathematical ways, telling her how many times his heart beats for her each minute, each hour, etc.

Division of: Symmetry

Facial features are arranged on a grid to form a face, about a line of symmetry.

General Mathpital: Asymmetriosis

In a model of an asymmetrical patient, the doctors try rearranging the pieces in various ways that would make it symmetrical.

Mathnet: The Case of the Unnatural - Part 5

Babs realizes that the numbers in the last part of Lefty's note are an address. Using a city map, the Mathnetters find Lefty. They prove that the ball player Steenbrenner is auctioning is an android.
